data.name: TemplateFile.Help
data.value: Template file are stored in /DesktopModules/FlexEvents/Texts folder and /DesktopModules/FlexEvents/Views folder.

data.name: Template.Help
data.value: Refer to the user guide for a complete list of available tokens.

data.name: Preview.Help
data.value: The preview might not be exactly same as the final output.

data.name: BookingCompleted.html
data.value: Email template when a booking is completed

data.value: Email template when a booking is pending

data.value: Display template of free event list

data.value: Email notification when a review is posted
